results.title: Ubiquinol rescues simvastatin-suppression of mitochondrial content, function and metabolism: implications for statin-induced rhabdomyolysis.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Rhabdomyosarcoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012208 @@@rhabdomyosarcoma@@@ cells were treated with either @CHEMICAL_Ethanol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000431 @@@ethanol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Dimethyl_Sulfoxide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004121 @@@dimethyl sulfoxide@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Dimethyl_Sulfoxide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004121 @@@DMSO@@@) control, or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ at 5 microM or 10 microM, or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ at 5 microM with @CHEMICAL_ubiquinol @CHEMICAL_MESH:C003741 @@@ubiquinol@@@ at 0.5 microM or 1.0 microM for 24 h or 48 h.

citations.NLM: Vaughan RA, Garcia-Smith R, Bisoffi M, Conn CA, Trujillo KA. Ubiquinol rescues simvastatin-suppression of mitochondrial content, function and metabolism: implications for statin-induced rhabdomyolysis. Eur J Pharmacol. 2013 Jul 5;711(1-3):1-9. PMID: 23624330
citations.BibTeX: @article{23624330, title={Ubiquinol rescues simvastatin-suppression of mitochondrial content, function and metabolism: implications for statin-induced rhabdomyolysis.}, author={Vaughan RA and Garcia-Smith R and Bisoffi M and Conn CA and Trujillo KA}, journal={Eur J Pharmacol}, volume={711}, number={1-3}, pages={1-9}}

results.title: In vitro and in vivo downregulation of the ATP binding cassette transporter B1 by the HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor simvastatin
results.text_hl: Finally, downregulation of @GENE_ABCB1 @GENE_5243 @@@ABCB1@@@ by a preincubation with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was sufficient to result in reduced @CHEMICAL_fluorexon @CHEMICAL_MESH:C007740 @@@calcein@@@ efflux rates in @<m>DISEASE_Rhabdomyosarcoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012208 @@@rhabdomyosarcoma@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Rhabdomyosarcoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012208 @@@RD@@@) cells (Werner et al.).

citations.NLM: Atil B, Berger-Sieczkowski E, Bardy J, Werner M, Hohenegger M. In vitro and in vivo downregulation of the ATP binding cassette transporter B1 by the HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor simvastatin Naunyn Schmiedebergs Arch Pharmacol. 2016 Jan;389(1):17-32. PMID: 26319048
